General.Name: ReNew Energy Global plc Warrant
General.Description: ReNew Energy Global plc generates power through non-conventional and renewable energy sources in India. It operates through Wind Power and Solar Power segments. The company develops, builds, owns, and operates utility scale wind and solar energy, as well as distributed solar energy projects that generate energy for commercial and industrial customers. As of March 31, 2021, the company had a total capacity of 9.86 GW of renewable energy. ReNew Energy Global plc was incorporated in 2011 and is based in Gurugram, India.

3.Name: Ms. Vaishali Nigam Sinha
3.Title: Chair of ReNew Foundation and Chief Sustainability & CSR Officer
